PermissionSetGroupComponent.name: PermissionSetGroupComponent
PermissionSetGroupComponent.description: A junction object that relates the PermissionSetGroup and PermissionSet objects via their respective IDs; enables permission set group recalculation to determine the aggregated permissions for the group.

PermissionSet.description: The permission set containing the permission set component.

PermissionSetGroup.description: The name of the permission set group.

PermissionSetGroupId.description: The ID of the permission set group containing the permission set component.

PermissionSetId.description: The ID of the permission set.
